body:
### CONTACT INFORMATION:
* _**Bohdan Tkachenko**_
* _**(408) 469-4397**_
* _**Bohdan@Tkachenko.io**_

### SUMMARY OF QUALIFICATIONS:
* 5 years of full-stack Web applications development experience
* Universal developer with both client-side and server-side knowledge
* Passionate about code quality. Can refactor someone else’s code
* Use TDD and BDD development processes. Prefer to have tests-covered code
* Write documented code, project and API documentation
* Well-developed understanding of computing and internet technologies
* Great debugging skills
* Very fast learner, can rapidly learn new technology
* Good Linux experience
* Pragmatic. Enjoy working as a part of result-driven team
* Familiar with Agile, Scrum and XP

### TECHNICAL SKILLS:
* **JavaScript:** Backbone.js, Angular.js, ExtJS, RequireJS, ReactJS, JSX, Flux, Reflux, Redux, Browserify, JQuery, canvas, WebGL, cocos2d-x-html5, Handlebars, Immutable, Isomorphic
* **NodeJS:** Express.js, Mongoose ODM, Jade, EJS, GruntJS, Mocha, chai.js, Socket.io, WebSockets, Moment.js, gulp.js, Webpack, ESLint
* **PHP:** Symfony 2, Doctrine 2 ORM, Twig, PHPUnit, Behat, PHP CodeSniffer
* **Databases:**  MySQL, MongoDB, Redis
* **Markup:** HTML5, CSS3, LESS, SASS, Twitter Bootstrap, Responsive Web Design, Cross-browser Compatibility
* **Other:** CoffeeScript, Dart, Python, Java, OOP, APIs, REST, RPC, JSON, CSON, XML, Maven, XUnit, Selenium Web Driver, GIT, SVN, Mercurial
 
### WORK EXPERIENCE:
**05/15 – Present / _Software Engineer, Goodwin.ua_**
* Implementing immutable and isomorphic ReactJS content management system
* Using Flux architecture
* Implementing server-side rendering for frontend
* Using Material UI for back-office

**11/14 - Present / _Software Engineer, Limelight Networks_**
* Developing self-service Web application with AngularJS
* Improved project automated build system by creating new Grunt tasks
* Reduced source code size by 50% of an application while performing optimizations
* Implemented internationalization and localization support in AngularJS application
* Upgraded build system of a project using Gulp and Webpack

**10/14 - Present / _Software Engineer, Project name is under NDA_**
* Developing ReactJS application
* Using Flux architecture
* Implementing API tests

**08/14 – 11/14 / _Software Engineering Intern, L3S Research Center_**
* Researched suitable framework for application
* Implemented Rich Internet Application with ExtJS 5 for scientific Web crawler
* Wrote full Web application technical documentation including API documentation
* Implemented user actions logging system

**01/13 – 07/14 / _Full-stack Web Developer, WookieeLabs_**
* Worked as a contractor for Ukrainian company (as Full-stack Web Developer)
	+ Built CRM Web application from scratch
	+ Technologies used: NodeJS, Express.js, Mongoose ODM, gulp.js, socket.io, Moment.js, Angular.js, Browserify

* Worked as a contractor for Nokia (as Full-stack Web Developer)
	+ Built social network Web application from scratch
	+ Technologies used: NodeJS, Express.js, Mongoose, Grunt, socket.io, Moment.js, Backbone.js, RequireJS, JQuery
	+ Implemented JSON-RPC 2.0 API with support of bunch API calls for mobile devices
	+ Set up automated test environment with Selenium Web Driver, Mocha and chai.js
	+ Guided three Automated QA Engineers and two Software Engineers into particular properties of the project

* Worked as a contractor for SandStorm R&D and WEB GMA R&D Ltd. (as JavaScript/Front-End Developer)
	+ Researched and then integrated best appropriate animation framework with canvas and WebGL support (cocos2d-x-html5)
	+ Implemented multiple games (available at http://crazywinners.com and http://ezscratch.com)
	+ Carried out novel and complex gaming concepts from a conceptual state to one of a working product
	+ Increased site loading speed by 20% with sprite sheet maps generation
	+ Optimized development processes in team by modernization of tools used
	+ Implemented server monitoring tool in Python which was tested production site in real-time for possible problems
	+ Implemented cluster cache for compiled JS code with Redis which improved project deployment speed by 150%

**07/11 – 01/13 / _Full-stack Web Developer, QArea_**
* Developed single-page complex bank Web application (Technologies used: Symfony 2, Doctrine 2 ORM, ExtJS 4)
* Improved client-side Web application usability by creating router system, loading mask manager, infinite grid scrolling, finite state machine for ExtJS
* Set up dynamic access control system for Symfony 2 
* Created PHP unit tests with PHPUnit
* Created unique PHP CodeSniffer rules set specially for project which checked for compliance with code conventions
* Designed Behat BDD context for ExtJS which made possible to create tests for ExtJS using plain text

**04/09 – 06/11 / _PHP Developer as a freelancer_**
* Built several Web applications with PHP and JavaScript
* Created mass mailing system for 1000+ recipients
* Integrated Visa, MasterCard and WebMoney payment systems to project

### OPEN-SOURCE CONTRIBUTION:
* Have several open-source projects
	+ https://github.com/BohdanTkachenko
	+ https://www.npmjs.com/~bohdantkachenko
* Contributor of iCrawl: The Integrated Focused Crawling Toolbox
	+ https://bitbucket.org/GerhardGossen/icrawl

### EDUCATION:
* **2014 / _Master of Computer Science, Kharkiv National University of Radio Electronics, Ukraine_**
* **2013 / _Bachelor of Computer Science, Kharkiv National University of Radio Electronics, Ukraine_**
